headline: Here's Why ETR Stock Deserves a Spot in Your Portfolio Right Now

headline: Consolidated Edison Rides on Investments & Renewable Energy Expansion
summary: ED's massive capital plan and expanding renewables aim to boost reliability and advance its net-zero push despite regulatory constraints.
